text:
Less than two months after Christina El Moussa was slammed online for posting an Instagram of her one-year-old son, Brayden, standing next to the edge of their pool, the thing that her fans were most scared of actually happened.

The Flip or Flop star's toddler actually fell into a pool while being watched by a nanny, according to E! News.

Related Story Christina El Moussa Shuts Down Mom Shamers Online

"Thankfully all is fine and Brayden is doing great," a source told E! News. "He's his happy, healthy self and Christina was being overly cautious by taking him to the hospital to be checked out."

While the original Instagram post that Christina posted of her son next to the pool has since been deleted, according to Entertainment Tonight, one commenter wrote, "as a mother it is scary to have a toddler being that close to a pool!"

Christina wrote back to the comments, saying, "OMG 1. It's a beach entry if he fell in it's only a foot high, he would be ok 2. It's not his first time in or around the pool, but thanks for your "concern" aka judgment 3. AND most importantly I am right there and could be to him in 3 seconds SMH at this .....!!!!"

While Child Protective Services was called to the hospital to question El Moussa and the nanny after Brayden fell into the pool, no actions were taken against the family, TMZ reports.

Follow Redbook on Facebook.
title: Christina El Moussa Says Her 1-Year-Old Son Is Fine After Falling Into Pool
